class_notes: This senior seminar analyses the factors shaping African Americans; human rights in the 20th and 21st centuries.
course_description: Spring. Multidisciplinary in nature, the readings of the senior seminar reflect the centrality of the historical and cultural contributions of African Americans to American history and culture.
